Title: Build an app with ASPNET Core and Angular from scratch
SubTitle: A practical example of how to build an application with ASP.NET Core API and Angular from start to finish
Description: Have you learnt the basics of ASP.NET Core and Angular?  Not sure where to go next?  This course should be able to help with that.  In this course we start from nothing and incrementally build up our API and Angular front end until we have a fully functional Web Application that we then publish to IIS and a Linux server.
WhatYouWillLearn: Learn how to build a web application from start to publishing using ASPNET Core (v2.1), Entity Framework Core and Angular (v6)^^SEPARATOR^^Students who complete this course will have a practical understanding of Angular and ASPNET Core^^SEPARATOR^^Understand how to structure an Angular application using best practices^^SEPARATOR^^Learn how to integrate 3rd party components into the Angular application^^SEPARATOR^^Use Visual Studio code effectively to improve workflow^^SEPARATOR^^Use AutoMapper^^SEPARATOR^^Implement drag and drop photo upload integrating into a cloud platform^^SEPARATOR^^Implement a private messaging system^^SEPARATOR^^Implement filtering, sorting and paging of data^^SEPARATOR^^Display notifications in Angular^^SEPARATOR^^Implement Authentication using JWT Authentication tokens^^SEPARATOR^^Handling errors in the API and the SPA^^SEPARATOR^^Persist data using Entity Framework Core^^SEPARATOR^^Real time notifications and presence using SignalR
Requirements: Hello world experience in ASPNET Core and Angular^^SEPARATOR^^A passion for wanting to learn how to build a fully functional Web Application
WhoIsThisCourseFor: Beginners to ASPNET Core and Angular who want to learn practical usage of these frameworks to build a compelling and functional application^^SEPARATOR^^Students who like to learn by doing rather than learning by theory

Title: Construyendo Web APIs RESTful con ASP.NET Core 6
SubTitle: ¡Aprende a construir y publicar cualquier Web API que te propongas!
Description: Vamos a ver todo el ciclo de vida del desarrollo de un Web API, desde crear la solución, desarrollar los endpoints, trabajar la manipulación de recursos, hasta su puesta en publicación en Azure.
WhatYouWillLearn: Construir Web APIs con .NET Core^^SEPARATOR^^Publicar Web APIs en Azure^^SEPARATOR^^Utilizar Azure DevOps para configurar integración y entrega continua (CI/CD)^^SEPARATOR^^Desarrollar Web APIs RESTful
Requirements: Conocimientos básicos de C# (saber qué es una clase, el condicional IF, cómo invocar una función)

Title: Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence with Python
SubTitle: Learn Complete Machine learning Python Artificial Intelligence Data Science Data Analysis and Deep Learning using Python
Description: Go from beginner to advance in Python Programming! Apply your knowledge in Machine Learning Data Science & Data Analysis in this intensive course!
WhatYouWillLearn: Use Python for Data Science and Machine Learning^^SEPARATOR^^Learn basic machine learning^^SEPARATOR^^Understand the uses of Machine Learning^^SEPARATOR^^Apply Machine learning in real world
Requirements: Interested and motivation to learn Machine Learning

Title: Machine Learning Nanodegree
SubTitle: أكبر كورس عربي لتعليم الألة والذكاء الأصطناعي لتأهيل مليون عالم بيانات عربي
Description: لدورة مليئة بالتمارين العملية التي تستند إلى أمثلة واقعية. لذا لن تتعلم النظرية فحسب، بل ستحصل أيضًا على بعض التدريب العملي  و تتعلم كيفية بناء النماذج الخاصة بك
WhatYouWillLearn: استخدم بايثون لعلوم البيانات والتعلم الآلي^^SEPARATOR^^تنفيذ خوارزميات تعلم الآلة^^SEPARATOR^^ريادة الأعمال بأستخدام الذكاء الاصطناعي^^SEPARATOR^^كيفية صنع بيئة عمل أفتراضية للتأهيل لسوق العمل^^SEPARATOR^^العقلية التحليلة^^SEPARATOR^^NumPy for Numerical Data تعلم ال^^SEPARATOR^^Pandas for Data Analysis تعلم ال^^SEPARATOR^^SciKit-Learn for Machine Learning Tasks استخدام ال^^SEPARATOR^^K-Means Clustering^^SEPARATOR^^Logistic Regression^^SEPARATOR^^Linear Regression^^SEPARATOR^^Random Forest and Decision Trees^^SEPARATOR^^Neural Networks^^SEPARATOR^^Support Vector Machines
Requirements: اللغة الأنجليزية^^SEPARATOR^^لغة البرمجة بايثون (Python)^^SEPARATOR^^أساسيات الجبر الخطي والمصفوفات^^SEPARATOR^^أساسيات الأحصاء^^SEPARATOR^^اساسيات التفاضل والتكامل^^SEPARATOR^^Algorithms and data structures^^SEPARATOR^^****..............Intermediate statistical knowledge:^^SEPARATOR^^Populations, samples^^SEPARATOR^^Mean, median, mode^^SEPARATOR^^Standard error^^SEPARATOR^^Variation, standard deviations^^SEPARATOR^^Normal distribution^^SEPARATOR^^Precision and accuracy^^SEPARATOR^^Hypothesis testing^^SEPARATOR^^Problem solving^^SEPARATOR^^Confidence Interval, P-values, T-test, Statistical Significance^^SEPARATOR^^Integrals^^SEPARATOR^^Intermediate calculus and linear algebra mastery:^^SEPARATOR^^Derivatives^^SEPARATOR^^Series expansions^^SEPARATOR^^Matrix operations through eigenvectors and eigenvalues
WhoIsThisCourseFor: الأشخاص المهتمة بتعليم ألة والذكاء الاصطتناعي^^SEPARATOR^^من عندهم خبره سابقة في تعلم أله ويريدون التعمق فيها^^SEPARATOR^^خريجي الجامعات او حتى طلاب الثانوي ويريدون العمل بتعليم الألة او مجال الذكاء الأصطتناعي^^SEPARATOR^^محللي البيانات والمحاسبين المالييين^^SEPARATOR^^الأشخاص الذين يريدون الترقي في العمل وزيادة قيمة مضافة للشركة التي يعمل بها

Title: Fundamentals of Programming: Understanding C#
SubTitle: Begin your journey into the world of programming through a series of easy to understand video lectures.
Description: This course is designed for people with NO prior programming experience. You will learn how to write computer programs using Microsoft Visual C#. The topics in this course are handpicked to build a strong foundation for all new programmers.
WhatYouWillLearn: Create computer applications to solve basic problems^^SEPARATOR^^Apply concepts of objected oriented programming
Requirements: Download Microsoft Visual Studio, however we will cover this in the first lecture.
WhoIsThisCourseFor: This C# course is designed for new programmers. If you have no programming experience or need a quick refresher, this is the course for you. This course is probably not for you if you're looking to learn advanced C# topics.

Title: Learn to build an e-commerce app with .Net Core and Angular
SubTitle: Build a proof of concept e-commerce store using Angular, .Net Core and Stripe for payment processing
Description: This course is very practical, about 90%+ of the lessons will involve you coding along with me on this project.  If you are the type of person who gets the most out of learning by doing, then this course is definitely for you.
WhatYouWillLearn: Net Core^^SEPARATOR^^Angular^^SEPARATOR^^C# Generics^^SEPARATOR^^Repository and Unit of Work Pattern^^SEPARATOR^^Specification Pattern^^SEPARATOR^^Caching^^SEPARATOR^^Angular Lazy loading^^SEPARATOR^^Angular Routing^^SEPARATOR^^Angular Reactive Forms^^SEPARATOR^^Angular Creating a MultiStep form wizard^^SEPARATOR^^Accepting payments using Stripe^^SEPARATOR^^Angular Re-usable form components^^SEPARATOR^^Angular validation and async validation
WhoIsThisCourseFor: Beginner and intermediate developers who want to enhance their knowledge of .Net and Angular who have some coding experience^^SEPARATOR^^Beginner and intermediate developers who wish to learn how to build an e-commerce style of site

Title: Complete guide to building an app with .Net Core and React
SubTitle: The complete guide to building an app from start to finish using .Net 7.0, React 18 (with Typescript) and Mobx
Description: Both ASP.NET Core and React are hot topics and this course will enhance your knowledge of both, simply by building an application from start to finish. In each module we learn something new, whilst incrementally adding features to the application. Building an application is significantly more rewarding than building yet another Todo List from the documentation!
WhatYouWillLearn: Learn how to build an application from start to publishing with .Net Core (v2.2), React (with Typescript) and Mobx^^SEPARATOR^^How to build a Web API in .Net Core with Clean Architecture using the CQRS + Mediator pattern^^SEPARATOR^^How to use AutoMapper and MediatR packages in the .Net projects^^SEPARATOR^^How to build a multi-project solution with .Net Core^^SEPARATOR^^How to use Entity Framework Core as the Object Relational Mapper^^SEPARATOR^^How to integrate ASPNET Core SignalR into an application for real time web communication^^SEPARATOR^^How to add Identity and Authentication using .Net Core Identity^^SEPARATOR^^How to build a Client side application for the API with React^^SEPARATOR^^How to use MobX as a state management library^^SEPARATOR^^How to build our own Photo upload widget with a Dropzone and a Cropper to resize images
Requirements: Some development experience required (3 -6 months)^^SEPARATOR^^A computer with Mac OSX, Windows or Linux installed^^SEPARATOR^^A passion for learning how to build web applications
WhoIsThisCourseFor: Beginners to .Net Core or React or Typescript who want to learn how to build something with these tools^^SEPARATOR^^Students who prefer the practical approach to learning rather than learning by theory
